messages.message:
Hi @Luke, this news just came out: *10.11.21 VentureBeat, Kyle Wiggers: Microsoft and Nvidia team up to train one of the world’s largest language models (https://venturebeat.com/2021/10/11/microsoft-and-nvidia-team-up-to-train-one-of-the-worlds-largest-language-models/)*
    ◦ Microsoft and Nvidia announced they have trained the largest and most capable AI-powered language model to date, Megatron-Turing Natural Language Generation (MT-NLP), containing 530 billion parameters. According to the two companies, the model achieves “unmatched” accuracy in a broad set of natural language tasks including reading comprehension, commonsense reading, and natural language inferences.
